articles.title: 'It's taken all of me': Australian surfer Tyler Wright wins at Bells Beach - The Guardian
articles.description: The two-time world champion overcame significant pain to defeat Carissa Moore in the final on Sunday
articles.content:
Two-time world champion Tyler Wright has made it third time lucky at Bells Beach after busting through the pain barrier to finally win the iconic World Surf League event.
